_header: Mary Mother and Maiden Ever well thee be
Note: An expansion into long lines of 3433.
Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayers to; prayers, to Virgin Mary
_description: ‘A preiere to vre ladi’ — fifty-two lines in mixed quatrtains, aabb, and 6-line stanzas, aabbcc; written in half-lines

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Marie Modur and MaydenEuere wel þe beModur and Mayden
                    myldeMarie þenk on me…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…And beo myn help studefastTo gete me þat
                    blisseÞat euermore schal lastenWiþ outen eny misse.
                    AME.N.
BodEngPoeta1.Note: Each line of verse written as two manuscript lines.
